object.name: InputMediaAudio
object.description: Represents an audio file to be treated as music to be sent.
object.html_description: Represents an audio file to be treated as music to be sent.
object.rst_description: Represents an audio file to be treated as music to be sent.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be audio
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *audio*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: File to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: File to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass “attach://<file_attach_name>” to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. More information on Sending Files »
annotations.rst_description: File to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. :ref:`More information on Sending Files » <sending-files>`
annotations.name: media

annotations.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail's width and height should not exceed 320. Ignored if the file is not uploaded using multipart/form-data. Thumbnails can't be reused and can be only uploaded as a new file, so you can pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' if the thumbnail was uploaded using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name>. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: Optional. Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail's width and height should not exceed 320. Ignored if the file is not uploaded using multipart/form-data. Thumbnails can't be reused and can be only uploaded as a new file, so you can pass “attach://<file_attach_name>” if the thumbnail was uploaded using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name>. More information on Sending Files »
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail's width and height should not exceed 320. Ignored if the file is not uploaded using multipart/form-data. Thumbnails can't be reused and can be only uploaded as a new file, so you can pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' if the thumbnail was uploaded using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name>. :ref:`More information on Sending Files » <sending-files>`
annotations.name: thumbnail

annotations.description: Caption of the audio to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Optional. Caption of the audio to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Caption of the audio to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: Duration of the audio in seconds
annotations.html_description: Optional. Duration of the audio in seconds
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Duration of the audio in seconds
annotations.name: duration
